message.purpbux_station: The Purpbux station allows you to create Purpbux using paper and bottled experience. The bottled experience can be created using the Experience extractor. It takes %s seconds to make one bux.
message.purpbux_exp_extractor: The exp extractor allows you to extract your experience and put it inside of a bottle. To create 1 bottle you need %s experience points.
message.purpbux_exp_bottle: The bottled experience can be created using the Experience extractor. Drinking this gives you %s experience points.
message.purpbux_wallet_info: This wallet lets you store %s Purp bux inside of it.
message.purpbux: This is a Purp buck. It has basically no use other than trading with other players.
